text: Hamono Parvardigori sumo Alloh ast, ki osmonhovu zaminro dar sas ruz ofarid. Sipas ʙar Ars mustavi sud. Saʙro ʙa ruz mepusonad va saʙ sitoʙon ʙa dunʙoli ruz dar harakat ast. Va oftoʙu moh va sitoragon musaxxari (romsudai) farmoni U hastand. Inho az nisonahoi ʙuzurgi Allohand. Ogoh ʙosed, ki Urost ofarinisu farmonravoi. Alloh, on Parvardigori cahonijon, ʙisjor ʙuzurg ast va az ajʙu nuqson pok ast
